## Vector3.cross() method

Calculates the cross product of two Vector3's.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static cross(a: Vector3, b: Vector3, result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The first operand. |
|  b | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The second operand. |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

the cross product of the two vectors.
